timeline.message:
NXP-28841: make sure it's the username's user workspace

The check is done with the user workspace ACLs by checking if the username
has 'Everything' permission.
The user workspace retriaval is as before NXP-26003.

timeline.message:
NXP-28841: make sure it's the username's user workspace

The check is done with the user workspace ACLs by checking if the username
has 'Everything' permission.
The user workspace retriaval is as before NXP-26003.
